sourcesContent:
import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetails(){ const[product,setProduct]=useState(null); const {id}= useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/products/'+id) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(res => setProduct(res.products)) },[]) return product &&
